@graph.name: Fleetmatics Telematics Integration - Connected Vehicle Platform - Route4Me Platform
@graph.description: Fleetmatics, a Verizon company, is a leading global provider of mobile workforce solutions for service-based businesses of all sizes delivered as software-as-a-service (SaaS). Our fleet management solutions enable businesses to meet the challenges associated with managing local fleets, and improve the productivity of their mobile workforces, by extracting actionable business intelligence from real-time and historical vehicle and driver behavioral data. Fleetmatics Group's intuitive, cost-effective Web-based fleet management solutions provide fleet operators with visibility into vehicle location, fuel usage, speed and mileage, and other insights into their mobile workforce, enabling them to reduce operating and capital costs, as well as increase revenue. An integrated, full-featured mobile workforce management product provides additional efficiencies related to job management by empowering the field worker and speeding the job completion process quote through payment. As of September 30, 2016, Fleetmatics served approximately 42,000 customers and approximately 826,000 subscribed vehicles worldwide.
@graph.keywords: Fleetmatics integration, fleet telematics, connected vehicle platform, GPS tracking, driver monitoring, route optimization, fleet management, commercial fleet solutions, Route4Me platform, vendor-agnostic telematics

isPartOf.name: Route4Me Route Optimization Platform
isPartOf.description: Route optimization and fleet management platform
isPartOf.operatingSystem: Web, Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS

additionalProperty.name: Customizable Reports
additionalProperty.value: Customizable reports in telematics allow users to tailor data analysis to their specific needs, offering insights beyond standard reports. These reports can be created based on various criteria like vehicle, trip, or driver and can include detailed information on fuel usage, driving behavior and more. This flexibility enables businesses to monitor key performance indicators (KPIs), track trends and make data-driven decisions for improved efficiency and safety.

additionalProperty.name: Document Management
additionalProperty.value: Drivers can use smartphone or tablet to capture delivery photos, record notes, collect electronic signatures and more. Access to these records allows for quick investigation of claims related to overages, shortages, damages, or missed delivery windows. Documents and notes are available anytime, enabling faster processes for tasks like customer invoicing, payroll and operational reviews.

additionalProperty.name: Invoice Management
additionalProperty.value: Functionalities for generating customer invoices, managing billing and automating complex billing processes. These features aim to streamline administrative tasks, improve efficiency and ensure accurate billing for fleet-related services.

additionalProperty.name: Driver/vehicle scheduling
additionalProperty.value: Driver and vehicle scheduling features in transportation and logistics software optimize route assignments, manage driver availability and ensure efficient fleet utilization. These features streamline operations by automating tasks like route planning, vehicle assignment and shift scheduling, ultimately leading to cost savings and improved service delivery.
